text: Mariano Nicolás González (born 5 May 1981) is a retired Argentine professional footballer who played as an attacking midfielder or as a winger. ==Club career statistics== |- |2001/02||rowspan="3"|Racing||rowspan="3"|Primera División||0||0 |- |2002/03||32||5 |- |2003/04||32||9 |- |2004/05||rowspan="2"|Città di Palermo||rowspan="2"|Serie A||21||2 |- |2005/06||30||2 |- |2006/07||Internazionale Milano||Serie A||14||0 |- |2007/08||rowspan="3"|Porto||rowspan="3"|Portuguese Liga||21||2 |- |2008/09||24||4 |- |2009/10|||| 64||14 65||4 45||6 174||24 |} ==International career statistics== |- |2003||4||0 |- |2004||4||0 |- |2005||0||0 |- |2006||0||0 |- |2007||0||0 |- |2008||1||0 |- !Total||9||0 |} ==Honours== ===Club=== Racing Club *Argentine Primera División: 2001 Apertura Inter *Serie A: 2006–07 Porto *Primeira Liga: 2007–08, 2008–09, 2010–11 *Taça de Portugal: 2008–09, 2009–10, 2010–11 *Supertaça Cândido de Oliveira: 2009 *UEFA Europa League: 2010–11 ===International=== Argentina *Summer Olympics: 2004 *Copa América runner-up: 2004 ==References== Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:Argentine footballers
